name: flag
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: flag
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a piece of cloth, usually rectangular and attached to a pole at one edge, that has a pattern that shows it represents a country or a group, or has a particular meaning

example.eg: Flags of all the participating countries are flying outside the stadium.
example.egtrans: 所有参赛国家的国旗都飘扬在体育场外。

example.eg: Flags were flapping/fluttering in the breeze.
The guard waved his flag and the train pulled away from the station.
example.egtrans: 护卫挥旗示意，火车从车站驶离。

dsense.name: flag
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: flag
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a flower that is a type of large iris

name: flag
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: flag
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to put a mark on something so it can be found easily among other similar things

example.eg: Flag any files that might be useful later.
example.egtrans: 给日后可能有用的文件做上标记。

trans_examp.trans_en: to mark computer information with one of two possible values so that you can deal with it later
trans_examp.trans_cn: 标记（计算机里某些信息，以便之后处理）

example.eg: We'll flag the records of interest in the database and then we can give you a print-out.
example.egtrans: 我们会在数据库中把值得关注的纪录标记出来，之后打印一份给你。

dsense.name: flag
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to become tired, weaker, or less effective

example.eg: I was starting to flag after the ninth mile.
example.egtrans: 走了9英里后，我开始感到疲倦了。
